talk.author: did:plc:xbimnw2uqrlknk2teyb6emzw
talk.utter: Ok, but... and hear me out, no one is going to read that shit.

talk.author: did:plc:zv4n2phq3byouvkjyoqjqchl
talk.utter:
In other words, voters are idiots who made a stupid decision based on vibes not reality. 
Yes that is the problem.

talk.author: did:plc:xbimnw2uqrlknk2teyb6emzw
talk.utter: I mean... Yes. Half of them probably think they're voting for the Donald Trump character from WWE or The Apprentice.

talk.author: did:plc:xbimnw2uqrlknk2teyb6emzw
talk.utter: But also, expecting people at large to take anything other than the path of least immediate resistance is foolish at best.
